author: alally
msg: UIMA-75: removed support for serializerClassName parameter
from Vinci service deployment descriptor, and removed the
Vinci serializer classes themselves.  These were no longer
used anywhere.  The example descriptors have been updated as well.

author: mturyn
msg: 'select="/ui"'.  Basic smoke tests on a few of these done, but if they didn't work before for some other reason, they won't work now.

author: jonesde
msg: Some improvements on error handling and message passing especially for failed commits when rollbackOnly is set; based on patch from Si Chen, but quite a bit different; from Jira #OFBIZ-503
